dcterms:description: AI2THOR is a photo-realistic simulator that enables continuous movements of the agent, making the navigation task more challenging and closer to real-world scenarios.

dcterms:description: Visual Genome connects language and vision using crowdsourced dense image annotations, providing a rich dataset for understanding object relationships and scene context.
